titleStmt.title: To the Most Reverend Fathers in God, William Lord Archbishop of Canterbury, Primate of all England and metropolitan, and John Lord Archbishop of York, Primate of England and metropolitan.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Re-printed by Joseph Ray, for Robert Thornton ...,

notesStmt.note: Includes: Directions concerning preachers (p. 9-14), with caption title.
Reproduction of original in: Trinity College (Dublin, Ireland). Library.
